20101208021414.857|20101208021416.286|CCO|IMPORTANT.
20101208021416.286|20101208021417.714|CCO|EMMA CLAIRE WHEN SHE WAS A BABY 
20101208021417.714|20101208021419.143|CCO|HAD COLIC AND CRIED FOR HOURS 
20101208021419.143|20101208021420.571|CCO|AND HOURS.
20101208021420.571|20101208021422.000|CCO|I COULD JUST ROCK HER AND SING 
20101208021422.000|20101208021423.250|CCO|TO HER FOR HOURS AND HOURS EVEN 
20101208021423.250|20101208021424.500|CCO|THOUGH SHE SCREAMED BACK AT ME

20101208021425.750|20101208021427.000|CCO|I THOUGHT IF THIS WERE WADE AND

20101208021454.857|20101208021456.286|CCO|>> Larry: YOU'RE ALIVE.

20101208022359.143|20101208022400.571|CCO|THAT, RIGHT?

20101208022402.000|20101208022404.000|CCO|>> NO, LARRY, WHAT IN FACT

20101208022410.000|20101208022412.000|CCO|FORGED HIS SIGNATURE ON SOME 
20101208022412.000|20101208022414.500|CCO|DOCUMENTS AND WAS REPRESENTED BY
20101208022414.500|20101208022417.000|CCO|A NEW ORGANIZATION THAT ALSO HAD
20101208022417.000|20101208022419.500|CCO|4,000 CLIENTS OF WHICH SOME WERE
20101208022419.500|20101208022422.000|CCO|IRS EMPLOYEES, DOCTORS, LAWYERS 
20101208022422.000|20101208022424.000|CCO|AND DENTISTS, THEY WERE 
20101208022424.000|20101208022426.000|CCO|REPRESENTING MR. SNIPES AS BOTH 
20101208022426.000|20101208022428.000|CCO|ACCOUNTANTS AND LAWYERS.
20101208022428.000|20101208022430.000|CCO|AND ACTUALLY HAD VARIOUS 
20101208022430.000|20101208022432.000|CCO|COMMUNICATIONS BACK AND FORTH
